member.name: T:AMicroblogAPI.HttpRequests.OAuthHttpGet
member.summary:
Performs a OAuth token-attached HTTP-Get request to the resource identified by the uri with the combination of OAuth parameters and the specified AdditionalParams(optional).
The signature is created upon the OAuth parameters and the specified . Do not put OAuth parameters in , they are automatically included. There are two ways to pass OAuth: 1. Put OAuth authorization info in HTTP header; (This way seems not working when there are additional parameters(in addition to OAuth parameters). All combinations tried.); 2. Put OAuth authorization info in query string. This class uses way #2. Hint: Cannot do both in the same request.

member.name: T:AMicroblogAPI.HttpRequests.HttpGet
member.summary:
Performs a simple/clean (non-token-attached) HTTP-Get request to the resource identified by the uri.
If there are qurey parameters, please add to . They will be appended to the uri before making the request.

member.summary:
Constructs the OAuth authorization header with the specified parameters. See RFC5849 section 3.4.1.3.2.
This method does the following: 1. Creates signature-base-string with the specified , and the . 2. Creates signature upon signature-base-string with sign-key (by and ). 3. Constructs OAuth Authentication header.
member.param: The parameters to used to construct OAuth authorization header(including OAuth protocol params and request-specific params).
The HTTP methods, like POST, GET etc.
The uri.
The token secret. (Could be a request token secret or access token secret.)
